definition: Czech/Czech Republic/abbr. for 捷克[Jie2 ke4]

sentences.english: Among the rubbish, you find a Halberd of the Swiftwatch.
sentences.chinese: 在地上的杂物间，你发现一柄迅捷戟。

sentences.english: How soon hath Time, the subtle thief of youth.
sentences.chinese: 时间多么迅捷，青春的高妙窃贼。

sentences.english: Scout troopers use their swift vehicles to rocket back to their bases to call on heavier forces.
sentences.chinese: 侦察兵依靠迅捷的交通工具飞速赶回基地召唤大部队。

sentences.english: Looking for a slightly snappier bike that you can pump easier?
sentences.chinese: 寻找一个稍微迅捷的自行车，你可以泵更容易？

sentences.english: Frankly, it’s a lot smoother, better-looking and easy to understand than the Web site.
sentences.chinese: 坦白讲，它比网站更迅捷更美观更容易被理解。

sentences.english: What I am really getting at are things like Swiftmend and Riptide .
sentences.chinese: 我们目前在这方面做到的法术有迅捷治疗和激流。

sentences.english: Fast, smart and flexible are embraced by the network. Linchpin behavior.
sentences.chinese: 互联网拥抱迅捷，聪明和灵活。

sentences.english: These fish move slow until they get spooked - then they are lightning fast and very clumsy.
sentences.chinese: 他们平时很迟钝，但是逃串的时候却又十分迅捷。

sentences.english: This ensures snappier up and running performance and cleaner code structures.
sentences.chinese: 这确保了迅捷启动和运行性能和更干净的代码结构。

sentences.english: It will be developed quickly with the development of the desires on vacation.
sentences.chinese: 随着旅游热的升温，这一产业必将得到迅捷发展。
全球变暖的迅捷解决方案？

sentences.english: Having a minimalist life and home also lets you find your things quicker.
sentences.chinese: 简单的生活和家庭也让你找东西更迅捷。

sentences.english: Hundreds of eagles were attached to this ship, and it rose with the swiftness of an arrow up towards the sun.
sentences.chinese: 鹰数百名附于本船，它与一对箭头迅捷太阳上升。

sentences.english: It eats grass and hay and is extremely muscular and fast.
sentences.chinese: 它吃的是鲜草和干草而肌肉发达，跑起来迅捷。

definition: pose or motion of one's body in martial arts
